{{Wireless embedded system |brand=HooToo |model=TripMate |revision=Elite (HT-TM04) |asin=B00UFLP86U, B012ZNMUL6, |price=100 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=travel router |pwr_v=120 |pwr_conn=AC (direct) |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT5350F |cpu1_cspeed=360 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT5350F |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=USB charging port, battery powered, |stock_boot=U-Boot;3.6.0.0; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.21; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt (unofficially) |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=TripMateElite-CEDE |default_ip=10.10.10.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui=00:1C:C2 |oui_eth=00:1C:C2 }} {{TagLine|Wireless Portable Router}} :[http://www.hootoo.com/hootoo-tripmate-elite-ht-tm04-wireless-portable-router.html Product page]
''HooToo TripMate Elite Travel Wireless Router'' - Mini Travel Router :6000mAh External Battery Pack, Dual USB Port, AC Charger :Wi-Fi Media Sharing for Flash Drive & Hard Disk Storage.
*[https://oldwiki.archive.openwrt.org/toh/hootoo/tripmate-nano ''HooToo TripMate'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki]
===Models=== *[[HooToo TripMate]] (HT-TM01) • [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00DTPYRTI B00DTPYRTI] :• [[Ralink]] RT5350F @360MHz 8/32MB *[[HooToo TripMate Nano]] (HT-TM02) • [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00HZWOQZ6 B00HZWOQZ6] :• [[Ralink]] RT5350F @360MHz 8/32MB • [https://www.hootoo.com/p/wireless-travel-router PPage] <!-- :HooToo Wireless Travel Router, USB Port, High Perf • TripMate Nano --> *[[HooToo TripMate Mini]] (HT-TM03) • [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00MUKX6PE B00MUKX6PE] :• [[Ralink]] RT5350F @360MHz 8/32MB *[[HooToo TripMate Elite]] (HT-TM04) • [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00UFLP86U B00UFLP86U] :• [[Ralink]] RT5350F @360MHz 8/32MB *[[HooToo TripMate Titan]] (HT-TM05) • [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00RVIGY1I B00RVIGY1I] • [https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B074LHG47K B074LHG47K] :• [[MediaTek]] MT7620N @580MHz 8/64MB • [https://www.hootoo.com/p/filehub PPage] <!-- :HooToo FileHub, Wireless Travel Router, iPhone iPad Portable SSD Hard Drive Reader, Photo Backup Device, :10400mAh External Battery Pack Travel Charger • TripMate Titan - Support a USB hub with 4 USB storage devices --> *[[HooToo TripMate Elite U]] (HT-TM06) • [https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B012ZNMUL6 B012ZNMUL6] :• [[MediaTek]] MT7620N @580MHz 8/32MB <!-- Dual USB charging ports (5V 1.0/2.1A), Support a USB hub with 4 USB storage devices -->
